sentences.english: Famine here is very serious. The government has already given out relieving grain to this area.
sentences.chinese: 此地糧荒嚴重，政府已經在調撥救濟糧了。

sentences.english: Towards the latter part of the occupation, the Japanese sought to ease the food problems by organising mass deportations .
sentences.chinese: 日治末期，爲解決糧荒，日人驅逐大批居民離境。

sentences.english: And on top of the Taliban insurgency, the Afghanistan people are now battling food crisis.
sentences.chinese: 因爲塔利班暴動，阿富汗人民正在對抗糧荒問題。
